ecological_assessment.qualitative_description: The model captures most NPZ model characteristics, but has some deviations from the exact mathematical structure specified

nutrient_equation_uptake.explanation: Partially matches Michaelis-Menten kinetics (N/(K_N+N)), but lacks self-shading term (a/(b+c*P))

nutrient_equation_recycling.explanation: Includes nutrient recycling through mortality and grazing, but not with the exact mathematical form specified (beta*lambda*P^2/(mu^2+P^2)*Z)

nutrient_equation_mixing.explanation: No explicit environmental mixing term (k*(N0-N)) present

phytoplankton_equation_growth.explanation: Captures nutrient-limited growth, but lacks the precise mathematical structure of (N/(e+N))*(a/(b+c*P))*P

phytoplankton_equation_loss.explanation: Includes mortality and predation terms, but not with the exact specified mathematical form

zooplankton_equation.explanation: Captures zooplankton growth and mortality, but not with the precise mathematical structure specified
